sentences.english: Men are allowed two weeks of paternity leave, on statutory pay.
sentences.chinese: 而男性的法定带薪休假仅有2周。
我当然希望能够带薪休假。

sentences.english: Workers band together to get paid holidays.
sentences.chinese: 工人们联合起来争取带薪休假。

sentences.english: Equal pay for equal work, paid leave, raising the minimum wage.
sentences.chinese: 平等同工同酬，带薪休假，提高最低工资标准。

sentences.english: They provide health-care insurance and paid vacation.
sentences.chinese: 他们提供医疗健康保险和带薪休假。

sentences.english: In advanced industrial societies, people are attaching increasing importance to paid holidays.
sentences.chinese: 在先进的工业化社会里，人们越来越重视带薪休假。

sentences.english: Full-time employees receive two weeks paid vacation after the first year. After five years it goes up to three weeks.
sentences.chinese: 全职员工在一年后有两周带薪休假，五年后增为三周。

definition: to receive one's regular salary (while on vacation, study leave etc)/paid (leave)/on full pay
to take a vacation/to go on holiday

to compensate for working on a holiday by resting on a workday/to compensate for resting on a workday by working on a holiday
